entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the people who was with Harry. He is mentioned as holding up his right hand to show two missing fingernails.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another person who was with Harry. She is described as raising her eyebrows coldly and adopting a lofty voice to wound Ron.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the narrator of the story, who managed to escape from his captors with the help of Ron and Hermione. He is mentioned as having apparated miles away from where he was supposed to be.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is a location that Harry, Ron, and Hermione visited. It is mentioned as the place where something happened, but the details are not specified.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: Harry's wand was taken by his captors, but he managed to grab it back and apparate away. Ron also had a wand that was being held by someone else.

relationships.description: Harry received help from Ron to escape from his captors. This is mentioned in the line 'while the others were distracted I managed to hit the one holding me in the stomach, grabbed his wand, disarmed the bloke holding mine, and Disapparated'.

Harry also received help from Hermione to escape from his captors. This is mentioned in the line 'while the others were distracted I managed to hit the one holding me in the stomach, grabbed his wand, disarmed the bloke holding mine, and Disapparated'.

Harry visited Godric's Hollow with Ron and Hermione. This is mentioned in the line 'Meanwhile we went to Godric’s Hollow and, let’s think what happened there, Harry?'
